name: Advanced Urology Center
description: A super specialty center of Patient Care Hospitals. SAUC is committed to provide world class comprehensive urology service with latest technology & skills.

name: Burn & Plastic Surgery Centre
description: Plastic surgery is a greatly misunderstood specialty all over the world and not just in our country.

name: Child Development Centre
description: Our motto is to prevent disability, optimize development and improve quality of survival of all children in Bangladesh.

name: Children Kidney & Dialysis
description: With the aim “Little kidney, we care” PCHL Children Kidney and Dialysis Centre offers comprehensive care for children with kidney disease and urinary tract problems.

name: Dental Care
description: Scaling, Pliolishing, Curettage, Root Planning, Filling, Root Canal Treatment, Crown and Bridge lirosthesis, Denture lirosthesis.

name: Diabetes & Endocrinology Centre
description: Hyperthyroidism, Hypothyroidism, Goiter, Thyroid nodule, Thyroid cancer.

name: Intensive Care Centre
description: The ICU is concerned with the provision of life support or organ support system in patient who critically ill and who usually require intensive monitoring in a highly vigilant environment.

name: Orthopedics & Trauma Centre
description: Patient Care Orthopedics & Trauma Centre is enriched to handle our orthopedic patients to a new standard.

name: Radiology & Imaging Centre
description: Patient Care Radiology Centre is fully equipped with a comprehensive Modern Radiology and Digital Imaging facilities.
